titles.title: Department of Defense Anti-Semitism and Racism Awareness Act of 2020

To amend the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020 to direct the Secretary of Defense to include questions regarding racism, anti-Semitism, and supremacism in workplace surveys administered by the Secretary.
Department of Defense Anti-Semitism and Racism Awareness Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Department of Defense Anti-Semitism and Racism Awareness Act of 2020
This bill directs the Department of Defense (DOD) to include in its surveys questions regarding whether respondents have ever (1) experienced or witnessed racist, anti-Semitic, or supremacist (or extremist as under current law) activity in the workplace; or (2) reported such activity. DOD must submit to Congress a report including (1) the text of the questions included in surveys, and (2) which surveys include such questions.
